title: Frostpunk GOTY Free
description:
Get Frostpunk GOTY PC game for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
Frostpunk, the newest title from the creators of This War of Mine, is a society survival game where heat means life and every decision comes at a price. In an entirely frozen world, people develop steam-powered technology to oppose the overwhelming cold. You face the task of building the last city on Earth and securing the means necessary for your community to survive.
Optimization and resource management often clash with empathy and thoughtful decision-making. While city and society management will consume most of the rulerâ€™s time, at some point exploration of the outside world is necessary to understand its history and present state. What decisions will you make to ensure the survival of your society ? What will you do when pushed to the limit? And who will you become in the process?

system_requirements.Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
